sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Intel Corp ( INTC ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.1%.
Year to date, Intel Corp registers a 13.0% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ), trading up 0.2%.
Procter & Gamble Company is lower by about 14.6% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Merck & Co ( MRK ), trading up 0.4%, and Cisco Systems ( CSCO ), trading up 1.9% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
